comments.comment: Reverse ekata yevve 2015 aapu avalam aanduva Tho ta amathakada LTTE eka demala lamayinta vath inna dunne ne.  Viruddha vunu mav piyan marala lamayi allagena gihin yuda puhunuva deela lamaa soldaaduvan lesa yedevva.  E lamayi palihak lesa paavichchi kalaa satan valadee.   Birinda marala tharuna semiyava arangiyaa yuda puhunuva denna.  Kema velak venuven sinhala geval val hitapu ballo balalluth meruvaa.  Thota un karapu aparaadha mathaka nethnam oluva hil karalaa "rana maga osse nandi kadaal" potha daaganin oluva ethulata
comments.author: Chandra Kulupana

comments.comment: Para ballo hamudaava meruve demala minissu neveyi.  Maha re sinhala gam valta vedila nidaagena hiti ahinsaka niraayudha minisunva kapaa kotaa marapu  gebini mav varunge bada palala daruva eliyata aran kapaa kota marapu le pipaasith rakusanvayi meruve.  Maga reka indalaa bus navaththalaa minisun bassalaa pelata thiyalaa vedi thiyala martapu Kaalakaanni yakshayinavayi meruve.  Thena thena bomba thiyalaa minisun marapu sadism valin pelunu ummatrhthaka yakshayinvayi meruve.  Tho kiyanne eka veradiyi kiyalada?  Un nomeruvaa nam ada thogevath magevath  miniyavath hoyaa ganna beri veyi.  Umba vage avalam ballo me loketa barak
comments.author: Chandra Kulupana

comments.comment: Ane pala  pakaya yanna thoge ammage huththe kalawa tho kade yanne minimaru padayekge putha ta thota amathakada nakiyo le pipasitha minimaru  wa premadasa kiyala uge anith  eka thamai agamathi putuwe inne tho kalakarayek newei jathi drohi ballek kari naki wesige putha thota amathaka wela 89 rata kothanada thibbe kiyala tyre wala ath pa badapu kollo kellanwa puchchala dapu hati bath kana  katin  goo kanna epa ponnayo tho kalakaryek nam samaja mehewaraka yedenna ona tho unpyata kade yanawa swarna mallawarchchi ekka aniyam pawul kala daruwekuth hadapu paka   reddak adanda awe jana madya idiriyata doller walata buranna

comments.comment:
Ane gon pakayo jana gathanayak karapu me rata vinasha kala rata pava dena UNP parayanta  kade yana val ballo. Thopi kalava kalava kiyanne thope job ekata. Rata venuven duk vinda ape ranavuruvanta avamana karana para ballo. Thopi janathava venuven vada karanavanam thope eka nirmanayak puluvannam free minisunta pannapalla. Thopi kalava kalava kiya kiya rata vinasa karanna try karanne. Thopita one 88/89 vage tyre da. 2009 labuna vage nidahase husma ganna ratakda. thopi vage kala kanninta sobadahama daduvam devi.
MAGE MAVBIMATA SUBA ANAGATHAYAK
